title: Fireflies of the Dead
description: Fireflies of the Dead is a collection of poetry and short stories. Exposing images of the strange, the grotesque and morbidly macabre.  An alien from a distant world falls to earth with an insatiable craving for human flesh and something even more frightening, a desire to mate! Witness the tragic tale of a lonely man with an unhealthy affection toward the fire.  Seven short stories and poems that will take you on a blood-soaked thrill ride filled with mayhem and horrific images.  Fireflies of the Dead will chill your blood.
author: Eric Kapitan
